changeSet.author: test
changeSet.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS elephant; create table Elephant ( ID int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL, Vertebrate boolean, ConservationStatus varchar(255), Mammal boolean, Age int, BirthDate date, Name varchar(255), Weight int, MaxKgOfNutsPerDay int, zookeeperid int, PRIMARY KEY(ID), FOREIGN KEY (zookeeperid) REFERENCES Zookeeper(id) ); INSERT INTO elephant( Vertebrate, ConservationStatus, Mammal, Age, BirthDate, Name, Weight, MaxKgOfNutsPerDay, zookeeperid ) VALUES( TRUE, "LC", TRUE, 14, NOW(), "Dumbo2", 1500, 5, 1)
